import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Star from '../Assets/Image/Star.png' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import {Api} from '../API/Api' import { endPoints } from '../API/Endpoint' const ProductCard = ({ data }) => { const[wishList,setWishlist] =useState() const addtowishlist = () => { const id = data._id console.log(id) const reqpayload = { "productId": id } Api.post(endPoints.ADD_TO_WISHLIST, requestpayload).then((res) => setWishlist(res)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) } console.log(wishist) return ( <>
{data.Title}
{data.delievery_charge === null ? 'free shipping' : ''}
{data.brandData.name}

{data.Price.sell_price.$numberDecimal} ({data.Price.current_store_price.$numberDecimal})
9% OFF

) } export default ProductCard
